item.title: MIUI OS2.0.104.0.VOMCNXM Recovery update for Redmi K80 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi K80 Pro China

Codename: miro

Version: OS2.0.104.0.VOMCNXM | 15.0

Size: 8.3 GB

MD5: f810008bcfffb825c4b3f1ce8459e679

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to January 2025. Increased system security.
[Control center]
New: Flashlight brightness adjustment page
New: Notification spotlight for flashlight
[Camera]
New: Film frame watermarks for Live photos
New: 32MP photos supported for ultra wide angle lens and Ultra HD mode
